template.name: Service PowerDNS Server
template.description:
PowerDNS Server (authoritative) monitoring template
Version: devel
#### Notes: - To use this template add pdns.conf configuration file: ``` webserver=yes webserver-address=127.0.0.1 webserver-allow-from=127.0.0.1,::1 # Don't set password # webserver-password Password required for accessing the webserver webserver-port=8081 ```
